messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] You're all invited...
messages.msgSnippet: ... Sorry, David, I wish I still lived in DuPont.  But alas, it s a tad far from Germany. Best of luck to Meera, I m sure she ll be great.  She s certainly got
messages.messageBody:
8/29/03 17:24:

> However, Meera has made quite clear that she wants ME to fill the
> place up (there are 700 seats, gulp!) So this is more than an
> invitation -- (threat: if you don't come, and live within 400 miles, I
> won't love you anymore!

Sorry, David,

I wish I still lived in DuPont. But alas, it's a tad far from Germany.
Best of luck to Meera, I'm sure she'll be great. She's certainly got the
spirit for it!

brenda
